Package com.sanyavertolet.interview.math.expressions

Class FunctionExpression

java.lang.Object
com.sanyavertolet.interview.math.expressions.Expression
com.sanyavertolet.interview.math.expressions.FunctionExpression
public class FunctionExpression extends Expression
Represents an expression that involves a function and its arguments. The FunctionExpression class encapsulates a Function and a list of Expression arguments that are passed to the function for evaluation.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • FunctionExpression

      public FunctionExpression(Function function, List<Expression> arguments) throws FunctionArgumentException
      Constructs a FunctionExpression with the specified function and arguments. The number of arguments must match the expected number of arguments for the function.
      Parameters:
      function - the Function to be applied.
      arguments - the list of Expression arguments for the function.
      Throws:
      FunctionArgumentException - if the number of arguments does not match the function's expected argument count.
